feedback_items.title: Create a simple banking dashboard prototype
feedback_items.description:
Create an HTML prototype showing a basic banking dashboard with:
- Account balance display
- Recent transactions list
- Quick action buttons (Transfer, Pay Bills, Deposit)
- Clean, modern UI design
- Responsive layout

This is an example task. The agent will implement this on first run.
feedback_items.notes: Successfully implemented. Dashboard includes balance display, 5 recent transactions, and 3 quick action buttons with responsive design.

feedback_items.title: Implement Transfer functionality
feedback_items.description:
Implement transfer functionality prototype. Following features:
- form-based (manually enter receiver)
- select from address book

This is enough for v1
feedback_items.notes: Successfully implemented. Transfer page includes manual entry form and address book selection with form validation and responsive design.

feedback_items.title: Add contact option
feedback_items.description: Add contact option (in a modern, ui-friendly way). But do not implement the flow (not even as a prototype)
feedback_items.notes: Successfully added. Modern floating action button (FAB) with contact menu showing Live Chat, Phone, and Email options. Added to both dashboard and transfer pages. Flow not implemented as requested - only UI elements with placeholder alerts.

feedback_items.title: Change dummy account number
feedback_items.description: Change dummy account number from ****1234 to ****1134

feedback_items.title: Transfer button is not displayed properly
feedback_items.description: After the last implementation, the transfer button changed the appearance. Now it is not as wide as the others, and also not responsive. Pls fix

feedback_items.title: Main Navigation
feedback_items.description:
Create a main navigation for an innovative retail banking app. Besides the already existing “Overview” the navigation should include the main customer needs structured as following:
1. Today
1.1 My Accounts & Cards
1.2 MY Budget
2. Rainy Day
2.1 My Insurance
2.2 My Overdraft
3. One Day
3.1 My Investments
3.2 My Housing

Also it should contain the following 4 elements:
4. Messenger
5. Language
6.Privacy 
7. Logout 

Items Overview, 1,2 & 3 should be more prominent then the rest. 

For now put a placeholder text upon click on the navigation Item, later we will together develope one section at a time.
